name: Clumsy Comrad
description:
Join Comrade's adventure! Play trough 9 fun levels!

Help him get past obstacles and stuff, he's clumsy, so he might fall over!

There might be updates for this game, so keep an eye on it! :)

CONTROLLS: W - jump, AD - move left and right.

Credit for suburban homes here: https://ellis-james-game-studios.itch.io/pixel-art-suburban-houses (thank you Ellis)
